name: Winter Skiing
description: This activity is ideal for winter enthusiasts. Enjoy the slopes and experience the thrill of skiing at Altitude Ski Resort.

name: Summer Hiking
description: Explore the beautiful terrain of Altitude Ski Resort in the summer. Hiking through the resort is a refreshing experience.

name: Snowboarding
description: Get ready for snowboarding in the best possible conditions. Perfect for adventurers looking for an exciting ride.
